price: Àti pé A fún ìjọba rẹ̀ ní agbára. A sì fún un ní ipò Ànábì àti ẹ̀kọ́ ọ̀rọ̀ àti ìdájọ́.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
